text:
Mikhail Innokentyevich Semyonov (, 26 November 1938 – 18 October 2019) was a Russian politician. He was born in Nukutsky District, Irkutsk Oblast, Soviet Union. He was the Chairman of the People's Khural of the Republic of Buryatia from 21 July 1994 through 23 June 2002.
Semyonov died on Ulan-Ude, Buryatia, Russia on 18 October 2019 from a long-illness at the age of 80.

annotations.surface_form: People's Khural of the Republic of Buryatia
